ygData.subject: Re: On a note of mistakes...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh, the first few probably got lucky and broke out.  It s probably related to level too. I keep an eye on if they resist or not.  I know that they were
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Mike Cummins" <pakrat77@...>
>
>Anytime a mob is hit (maybe just by magic) it has chance to break root. and
>sometimes it doesn't stick because you are resisted..
>
>Fiera Mindbender [BAD]
>Erudite Enchanter-Xegony
>.

Oh, the first few probably got lucky and broke out. It's probably related to
level too.

I keep an eye on if they resist or not. I know that they were rooted. I'm
pretty
sure they conned yellow to me though so they probably have a better chance
to break
then the ones that con blue.

Azboklin the enchanter
